monitorAttachmentFilter: {{REDCROSS}} Dear {{user}}, file attachments aren't allowed here.
monitorInviteFilterAlert: {{REDCROSS}} Dear {{user}}, invite links aren't allowed here.
monitorNolink: {{REDCROSS}} Hey {{user}}, you are not allowed to post links here!
monitorWordFilterDm:
Shush! You said some words that are not allowed in the server! But since you took a moment to write the message, I will post it here:
{{filtered}}
monitorCapsFilterDm: Speak lower! I know you need to express your thoughts. There is the message I deleted:{{message}}
monitorWordFilter: {{REDCROSS}} Pardon, dear {{user}}, you said something that is not allowed in this server.
monitorCapsFilter: {{REDCROSS}} EEEOOO {{user}}! PLEASE DO NOT SHOUT IN THIS PLACE! YOU HAVE HIT THE CAPS LIMIT!
monitorMessageFilter: {{REDCROSS}} Woah woah woah, please stop re-posting so much {{user}}!
monitorNewlineFilter: {{REDCROSS}} Wall of text incoming from {{user}}, wall of text taken down!
monitorReactionsFilter: {{REDCROSS}} Hey {{user}}, please do not add that reaction!
monitorNmsMessage: The banhammer has landed and now the user {{user.tag}} with id {{user.id}} is banned for mention spam.
Do not worry! I'm here to help you! ðŸ˜„

Threshold: {{threshold}}.
monitorNmsAlert: Be careful mentioning any more, as you are about to be banned for exceeding this server's mention threshold.
